name: Loloof64_ICTK
short_description: ICTK 0.2.0 has a very big bug, when you call  ContinuationArrayList#removeAll(). However, for one of my project to be effective (SimpleChessBoard for Android) I needed this method to be patched. As the ictk  forge had no update since 2003, I thought it was not useful to send them any patch, but rather make my own forge and submit it. This way, I stay under the GPL2 restrictions : the original license.
summary: ICTK with a very light patch
